item.title: Why Netflix is making a big mistake trying to buy Warner Bros. Discovery, according to a top analyst
item.description: Laura Martin of Needham estimates that buying WBD would put $83 billion of additional value at risk of disruption from generative AI.

item.title: Disney's chart is pointing to a rebound. How to capture a trading profit using options
item.description: Nishant Pant describes why the charts are signaling the Disney comeback has more room to run.

item.title: Traders brace for a ‘hawkish cut’ from the Fed. Here’s what that means
item.description: Wall Street expects the Fed to deliver a "hawkish cut" this week. Not sure what that means? Well, wonder no more.

item.title: Deutsche Bank sees more upside for Micron heading into chipmaker's earnings
item.description: Deutsche Bank's revised price target implies additional upside of 13% ahead for shares of Micron.

item.title: A little-known biotech stock more than doubled this week. Why Wells Fargo sees further upside
item.description: The bank reiterated the Singapore-based biotech name as overweight and hiked its price target.
